text: Ameriyeh (, ) or El Amiriye ( Mazıcı) is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Located some southeast of al-Rai and the border with Turkey, it is administratively part of Nahiya al-Rai in al-Bab District. In the 2004 census, Ameriyeh had a population of 881. ==References== Category:Turkmen communities in Syria
title: Ameriyeh, al-Bab
